channel.title: Projects on Miguel Rizzo
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Miguel Rizzo

item.title: Medical Appointment no-show EDA and classifier
item.description: Created a tool that estimates whether a patient will show or not at a scheduled medical appointment (Accuracy=0.75%) to give a better understanding of why the patients would miss an appointment and provide information to clinical facilities for improving efficiency and productivity. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Discrete Event simulation of a queue using Python.
item.description: Generated a Simulation model that outputs the performance measures, such as average length, average waiting time, utilization of the system, etc. to provide information for designing or improving service facilities. Showed that using this approach, system changes and different layouts can be tested without actually having to carry them out physically. Simulated over 1000 customer arrivals and departures using Python. Link to GitHub Repository
